summary: NAR 03-24-2003    MR.  THE VEHICLE HAS BEEN TO THE REPAIR SHOP ON 6 DIFFERENT OCCASIONS FOR THE SAME STALLING PROBLEM.  THE FIRST TIME THE INCIDENT HAPPENED THE VEHICLE LOST ALL POWER AFTER COMING TO A STOP. AFTER THE FIFTH VISIT THE CONSUMER WAS TOLD THERE WAS A PROBLEM WITH THE IGNITION COIL AND THE CONSUMER WOULD HAVE NO OTHER PROBLEMS, HOWEVER THAT PROVED NOT TO BE TRUE. EACH TIME THE CONSUMER WENT TO THE DEALER ANOTHER PART WAS REPLACED WITH THE SAME RESULTS. *JB
